name: Infinity drive
description:
Info:
This game was made for the 2020 GMTK Game Jam in roughly 10  hours. Unfortunately I didn't have the time to make a soundtrack for this game.

Controls: A or Left Arrow Key = Go to the left.
D or Right Arrow Key= Go to the right.
Ctrl = Tiny Slowdown.

Credits:
Here are the graphics that were used. Code is 95% by me (except Pooling which is from Brackeys)

Background vector created by 0melapics - www.freepik.com

Tree Model by MikeDragneel

Rock Model by dvnc.tech

Car Model by Ivan Norman

Thank you: 
Thank  you for playing my game. I hope you like it.
